message.body: good morning, beautiful! i hope your birthday is as wonderful as you are and that you celebrate it in style. basically: you're awesome, i love you, and we're the same age again.
Just wanted to talk to you about something because I know you'll tell me whether I'm rationally upset or just being psychotic.
i have stuff to do after this but it might be helpful to type it all out on fb and send it to me! the reflection could do you good anyway.
Oh god, I just cried in front of him. I hate myself.
nooo! don't be afraid of showing him feelings. especially considering how open he's been with you.
I just feel vulnerable and I hate it. I don't remember the last time I felt like this.
it's a good thing, i promise.
Like, coming down is the worst thing and I would travel half way across the state to get something.
Literally just thought, "Well, if worse comes to worst, I can hook up with someone else tonight." Douchebag brain, go away.
at least you recognize that those aren't productive thoughts...
:( feel better. let me know if i can do anything.
Like, if you don't find me attractive the way I am, go be with someone you do find attractive.
my mom and i were talking about weight and i mentioned what nakul said to you and she told me to pass along the following...
Fwd: omg. i hope she IS done. that is horrible. he doesn't deserve her!
Fwd: remind her that she's awesome just the way she is!
